div.p: The JV Quiz Bowl Team were a long shot to make the conference play offs, but this is what hard work and persistence can get you. Well-done, Blue Jays! view image
Thank you to all of our preschool Scholastic Book Club sponsors! The preschoolers enjoy receiving their monthly book! Our March Scholastic book was, "Too Many Carrots" by Katy Hudson. view image
